# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### Power generation structure at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position 106.5, -32.5)
- Boiler (position 111.5, -32.0)
- Steam engine (position 117.5, -30.5)
- Pipe group (position 107.5, -34.5)
- Pipe group (position 105.5, -32.5)

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position 63.5, -53.5)
- Transport belt (position 64.5, -53.5)

### Inserter system at position (39.5, -79.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position 39.5, -79.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to function properly.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to transport.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected to a fluid source.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly connected to the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
